trans-unit.source: Specifies the types of acknowledgment message that Message Queuing returns to the sending application.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Message Queuing 傳回給傳送應用程式的通知訊息型別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.AcknowledgeTypes> class provides a set of flags that you can combine to request one or more categories of acknowledgment messages.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.AcknowledgeTypes>類別提供一組旗標，您可以組合要求的通知訊息的一或多個類別。

trans-unit.source: When an application sends a message, it can request that Message Queuing return acknowledgment messages indicating the success or failure of the original message.
trans-unit.target: 當應用程式傳送訊息時，它可以要求訊息佇列傳回指出成功或失敗，原始訊息的認可訊息。

trans-unit.source: Message Queuing sends these acknowledgment messages to the administration queue you specify.
trans-unit.target: 訊息佇列會傳送這些通知訊息給您指定的管理佇列。

trans-unit.source: Acknowledgment types can be divided broadly into four groups: positive arrival acknowledgments, positive read acknowledgments, negative arrival acknowledgments, and negative read acknowledgments.
trans-unit.target: 通知類型可以大致可分為四個群組： 正抵達通知、 正讀取的通知、 負抵達通知和負讀取的通知。

trans-unit.source: Requesting acknowledgments enables your application to receive notification of certain occurrences—for example, a message reaching its destination queue, a message being retrieved, or a time-out preventing a message from reaching or being retrieved from the destination queue.
trans-unit.target: 要求通知可讓您的應用程式接收通知的特定項目 — 比方說，訊息到達目的地佇列、 已擷取訊息或防止訊息到達，或從擷取逾時目的地佇列。

trans-unit.source: When you are using the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class to send messages to a queue, you specify the types of acknowledgments your application should receive in the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.AcknowledgeType%2A> property, as well as the administration queue that receives the acknowledgment messages in the <xref:System.Messaging.Message.AdministrationQueue%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.Messaging.Message>類別將訊息傳送至佇列，您會指定您的應用程式應該會在收到的通知類型<xref:System.Messaging.Message.AcknowledgeType%2A>屬性，以及接收通知訊息中的管理佇列<xref:System.Messaging.Message.AdministrationQueue%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Messaging.Message> class to read acknowledgment messages in the administration queue, the instance's <xref:System.Messaging.Message.Acknowledgment%2A> property indicates the condition responsible for the acknowledgment message, for example, if a time-out expired before the original message was read from the queue.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.Messaging.Message>類別，以讀取認可訊息在系統管理佇列中，執行個體的<xref:System.Messaging.Message.Acknowledgment%2A>屬性表示的條件負責通知訊息，例如，如果逾時過期之前原始訊息已從佇列讀取。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sends and receives a message that contains an order to and from a queue.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將傳送和接收包含訂單與佇列的訊息。

trans-unit.source: It specifically requests a positive acknowledgment when the original message reaches or is retrieved from the queue.
trans-unit.target: 它特別要求正值通知，當原始訊息抵達或已從佇列擷取。

trans-unit.source: A mask used to request positive acknowledgment if the original message reaches the queue or negative acknowledgment if the time-to-reach-queue timer expires or if the original message cannot be authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 如果原始訊息到達佇列，則為用來要求正通知的遮罩，如果到達佇列所需時間計時器到期或無法驗證原始訊息，則為用來要求負通知的遮罩。

trans-unit.source: A mask used to request positive acknowledgment if the original message is received from the queue before its time-to-be-received timer expires or negative acknowledgment otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果在到達佇列所需時間計時器到期之前接收到原始訊息，則為用來要求正通知的遮罩，否則為用來要求負通知的遮罩。

trans-unit.source: A mask used to request a negative acknowledgment when the original message fails to be received from the queue.
trans-unit.target: 當原始訊息無法由佇列接收時用來要求負通知的遮罩。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method does not remove a message from the queue, so this acknowledgment type could be returned even if you did peek the message.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法不會移除訊息佇列，因此無法傳回此通知類型，即使您未看到此訊息。

trans-unit.source: Only the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method (or the related asynchronous <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method) removes a message from the queue.
trans-unit.target: 只有<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Receive%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法 (或相關非同步<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginReceive%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法) 從佇列移除訊息。

trans-unit.source: A mask used to request that no acknowledgment messages (positive or negative) be posted.
trans-unit.target: 用來要求不發佈通知訊息 (正或負) 的遮罩。

trans-unit.source: A mask used to request a negative acknowledgment when the original message cannot reach the queue.
trans-unit.target: 當原始訊息無法抵達佇列時用來要求負通知的遮罩。

trans-unit.source: This can happen when the time-to-reach-queue timer expires or if a message cannot be authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 到達佇列所需時間計時器到期或無法驗證訊息時，才會發生這種情形。

trans-unit.source: A mask used to request a negative acknowledgment when an error occurs that prevents the original message from being received from the queue before its time-to-be-received timer expires.
trans-unit.target: 當發生錯誤使原始訊息在接收時間計時器到期前，無法由佇列接收時用來要求負通知的遮罩。

trans-unit.source: A mask used to request a positive acknowledgment when the original message reaches the queue.
trans-unit.target: 當原始訊息抵達佇列時用來要求正通知的遮罩。

trans-unit.source: A mask used to request a positive acknowledgment when the original message is successfully retrieved from the queue.
trans-unit.target: 當由佇列擷取原始訊息成功時用來要求正通知的遮罩。
